{{cpp/ranges/transform_view/iterator/title | operator*}}
{{cpp/ranges/transform_view/navbar}}

{{ddcl | since=c++20 |
constexpr decltype(auto) operator*() const;
}}

Returns the transformed element.

Effectively returns {{c|std::invoke(*parent_-&gt;fun_, *current_)}}, where {{tt|*parent_-&gt;fun_}} is the transformation function stored in the parent {{tt|transform_view}}, and {{tt|current_}} is the underlying iterator into {{tt|V}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The transformed element.

===Notes===
{{c|operator-&gt;}} is not provided.

The behavior is undefined if the pointer to parent {{tt|transform_view}} is null (e.g. if {{c|*this}} is default constructed).

If {{tt|*current_}} is a prvalue, its lifetime ends before this function returns. If the transformation function returns a reference or pointer to it, the result would dangle.
